description: sketchbook with green cardboard covers and a black binding; contains a few pages of cursive writing in German at the front of the book followed by a few pages of sketches of unidentified objects and a few pages of figure studies; rest of sketchbook has blank pages; the front cover of sketchbook is detached from the rest of the book
inscription: LRC of inside cover, in pencil: 1406 [crossed out] | URC of fourth sheet in sketchbook in red pencil, on verso: 105
markings: purple stamp in ULC of the inside of the back cover: Walter Gramatté / Berlin W. 15 [illegible] / Fernspr.: 3662 Pfalzburg.
title: Sketchbook A
